name: Euro Global Conference on Proteomics, Genomics and Bioinformatics
content: Magnus Group is delighted to welcome you all to the “Euro Global Conference on Proteomics, Genomics and Bioinformatics” (EURO PROTEOMICS) which will take place in a hybrid manner at Paris, France and virtually from September 12-13, 2022\. The congress will emphasize the theme “Envisioning the Future and Exploring All Facets of Proteomics, Genomics and Bioinformatics.” This global summit will show appreciation to the tireless efforts of protein experts, genomics specialists, researchers, scientists, academicians, bioinformaticians, healthcare practitioners, and clinicians to address the challenges by focusing on the most recent advances and innovations in proteomics, genomics and bioinformatics to enable more powerful analytics for translational research toward better health and disease interventions through investigation of the human, model animal, microbial, or plant proteome. Plenary lectures, invited talks, symposiums, panel discussions, oral presentations, e-poster sessions and scientific sessions relevant to contemporary research developments and conclusions will be the emphasis of our agenda, ensuring that our event is a resounding hit. We strongly encourage you to participate in and contribute to one of the most significant events in the field of proteomics, genomics and bioinformatics in 2022\. We are convinced that you will like the scientific program's range and quality of EURO PROTEOMICS 2022\.
